'''"Way to the Extreme"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Way to the Extreme" is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Tequemecan Valley}} after completing an aiming [[Time Trial Challenge]].

Item Way to the Extreme Context.png|Additional context
